meta_description: Explore contemporary art and arts education at Sumter County Gallery of Art, serving Sumter, Lee, and Clarendon counties in South Carolina. Enjoy exhibitions, classes, and events. Visit us today!

## Know Before You Go

###  Hours of Operation 

Open Tuesday – Saturday  
11 AM-5 PM  

Sunday – Monday  
Closed

###  Admission 

Admission is always free.

###  Address 

200 Hasel Street  
Sumter, SC 29150

###  Parking 

Plenty of general parking and accessible/van parking close to the entrance

###  Tours 

Free group tours are available by reservation. [Contact us](https://www.sumtergallery.com/contact) to learn more.

###  Accessibility 

  * We have two ramps. One for our main entrance and a switchback ramp for the side entrance.
  * There is an elevator to the second floor
  * All first floor restrooms have wheelchair accessible stalls
  * The main entrance doors and side doors are electronic
  * Large print labels and wall text
  * Adaptive art tools and wide aisles in all classrooms
  * The Sumter County Gallery of Art website is completely accessible WCAG 2.0AA

###  Gift Shop 

The gallery gift ship is the “best kept secret in Sumter” offering one-of-a-kind, artisan-made fine jewelry, pottery, art glass, fiber art, and paintings made by local and regional artists.

# Membership

## Membership Information

Annual dues from members of the Sumter County Gallery of Art provide critical financial support for all gallery programs and partnerships. Annual Membership includes:

  * Invitations to all gallery events
  * Catered opening receptions for all exhibitions
  * Member discounts on special gallery events
  * 10% discount in the gallery gift shop
  * Member discounts on all youth and adult classes
  * Semiannual Newsletter
  * Memberships are 100% tax deductible

### NARM Membership Privileges

[NARM (North American Reciprocal Museum Association)](https://narmassociation.org/) membership privileges at over 1000 museums across the country.  
Included in: Patron, Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Platinum membership levels. 

## Membership Levels

### Individual ($50)

  * Privileges for one adult

### Active Military ($50)

  * Privileges for an active military family

### Senior ($50)

  * Privileges for one senior adult

### Family ($75)

  * Privileges for a family (including grandchildren)

### Patron ($100)

  * [NARM](https://narmassociation.org/) membership
